name: Ghostbusters Inc.
description:
This was part of my one-game-a-month challenge almost a decade ago. This was an attempt to build and expand on the mechanics from David's Cranes ghostbusters game for the NES.

Open your own Ghostbusters branch, hire your staff, research new gear, and more importantly pay the bills. Explore your own randomly generated city and try to track down the four local legends.

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Mouse to Aim and Fire

- Left Alt to throw and open a trap

There are some UI issues.
